schema.name: Experience_arm
schema.description: The identification of experience and the association of experience with a person or an organization.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the experience.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: The label by which the experience is known.

entity.name: Experience_assignment
entity.description: An experience is assigned to a person or organization.

explicit.name: person_or_organization
explicit.description: The person or organization that has the experience.

explicit.name: experience
explicit.description: The experience of a person or organization.

explicit.name: start_date
explicit.description: Date on which the gaining of the experience started.

explicit.name: end_date
explicit.description: Date on which the gaining of the experience finished.

explicit.name: capacity
explicit.description: The capacity in which the experience has been acquired.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the type of experience.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: The label by which the type of experience is known.
